txt.en: 'This is not a memory I wish to relive, but I will, if it helps you save our land.'
The Story of a Strange Stone
Iothete wishes to speak with you about a strange event that took place a year ago.
'I am ready to tell you my strange tale, [placeholder]. No one has ever believed me, but I hope you will, now that you have touched the stone.'
Iothete is in his hut in the woods in the Whitshaws.\n\nYou should speak with Iothete and hear his tale.

'There you have it, [placeholder]. A grim and cursed tale, is it not?'

The stone Saruman gave Iothete is the key. It is a fragment chipped from the very stone that Núrzum carries with him upon his back.

It is the source of the cold spreading throughout Wildermore, for it goes where Núrzum goes. Gárwig must hear of this discovery at once!
Iothete is in his hut in the woods in the Whitshaws.\n\nYou should speak with Iothete.
